<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>To Do</title>
    <script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/angularjs/1.3.14/angular.min.js"></script>
    <script src = "app.js"></script>
  </head>

  <body ng-app='ngTodo'>
    <div class="todos-container" ng-controller='todoController'>
      <h1>To Dos</h1>
<!--       <input ng-model="newTodo"/>
      <button ng-click="todos.push(newTodo)">Submit</button>
 -->
      <form ng-submit="handleClick()">
        <input type="text" ng-model="newTodo" />
        <input type="button" value="submit" ng-click="handleClick()" />
      </form>
      <!-- <submit type="button" ng-submit= -->
      <ul>
        <li ng-repeat="todo in todos track by $index" ng-click="todos.splice($index, 1)"></li>
      </ul>

      <hr>
      <!-- <pre>
        
      </pre> -->
    </div>
  </body>
</html>

//app.js
console.log(angular);
angular.module('ngTodo', [])
  .controller('todoController', function($scope) {
    $scope.todos = [];

    $scope.handleClick = function() {
      console.log('clicked');
      $scope.todos.push($scope.newTodo);
      $scope.newTodo = '';
    };
});
